name: Runic Demo
description:
The Game

Play as an undead warrior who is trying to escape past frost giants, who killed him, to return home and warn your village. Use various powers to escape their grasps.

Runic is a game made by students in 5 months for Full Sail University. There are plans to touch up models, animations, and add more levels with new mechanics in the future and then release to steam. If you find any bugs, please put them in the comments below.

Game Designer, Level Designer, and Programmer
Katie Givens
Robert McSheffrey
Caleb Nichols
Darian Unger
Victor Vazquez

Music
Daniel Grotz

Art
Brett Tatosian
Chad Kendall
